Vulois looked at the gifted child. It definitly had the powers of The 
Matrix. What did Convix say? The child is important, but not now. 
There are somethings he nad to unravel first. He spoke to the bots 
father.

"Bring the child back in one week. Than it will be trained. As for 
the peace conference, it is already in the works. My assistance have 
gone out to arrange it. I will notify you of when it is. It is good 
to here that there are a few bots who want peace."(I'm leaving again 
with a few of my friends. I won't be able to post until next Saturday 
night, but I will post tomorrow.)

Vulois than turns away and concentrates on Galvatron. He knew he had 
to keep his promise. He unlocked the lock on the image. Galvatron can 
go in and remove it himself now. Vulois headed back into the embassy.

______________________________________________________________________


As Brix and Ramulus start carrying the pod, an idea comes to Brix.

"Hey, if you're re-building the Ark, I know where there are spare 
parts. The ship I captained, The Metropolition, crashed on Earth's 
moon. I'm sure there is plenty of scrap up there that can be used. 
The life-support systems are still on, it's just a bit run-down. We 
could even use it as a back-up base. Only questions is how do we get 
up there?"
